thing-type.label: P1-dongle P1-dongle
thing-type.description: P1-dongle<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe P1-dongle sends smart meter data wirelessly to your controller, helping you get insight of your consumption and things like the overall yield of your solar panels. The P1-dongle can connect to smart meters that support DSMR (Dutch Smart Meter Reader Protocol) eg. all smart meters with a P1-connector.</p&gt <p&gtLED Status Information</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtReady to install: LED pulse once per second</li&gt <li&gtIncluding: LED pulse twice per second</li&gt <li&gtExcluding: LED pulse three times per 1.5 second</li&gt <li&gtInclude Successful: LED on for one second</li&gt <li&gtReady and operating in a Z-Wave network: LED continuously on</li&gt <li&gtNo ready and not included in a Z-Wave network: LED pulse once per second</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtPut you controller in inclusion mode</li&gt <li&gtConnect the P1 Dongle to your Smart Meter (use a power source when needed)</li&gt <li&gtThe P1 Dongle will switch to Network Wide Inclusion automatically</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtUse the button to switch the P1 Dongle to Inclusion (LED pulse twice per second) or Exclusion / Reset (LED pulse three times per 1.5 second) mode</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtPut your controller and the P1 Dongle in exclusion mode (LED pulse three times per 1.5 second)</li&gt <li&gtThe dongle will exclude from it's former network and reset to node ID zero </li&gt <li&gtIf the P1 Dongle wasn't included in a network before, this procedure will act as a node reset</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtUse the button to switch the P1 Dongle to Inclusion (LED pulse twice per second) or Exclusion / Reset (LED pulse three times per 1.5 second) mode</p&gt
